en-US.summary: Test your knowledge of the US states and their capitals.
en-US.name: States Quiz
en-US.description:
Test your knowledge of the US states and their capitals.

States Quiz provides a fun way to keep your U.S. geography skills sharp.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch States Quiz" or "Alexa, open States Quiz" to start the game".

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"

en-GB.summary: Test your knowledge of the US states and their capitals..
en-GB.name: States Quiz
en-GB.description:
Test your knowledge of the US states and their capitals.

My Radio provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch States Quiz" or "Alexa, open States Quiz" to start the game".

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
